data.text:
@Gab_H_R @FanCpixie Result of 3 yrs gaslighting.
now's the next stage: historical revisionism (does that word exist in english? en allemand:Geschichtsrevisionismus)

@Gab_H_R @FanCpixie Illnesses like this that always more common to us. CFS, ME have been ignored and crippled many people but rarely studied. Maybe now we will actually see progress on that?

Let's hope.

@Gab_H_R @FanCpixie I mean, major depression is pretty bad on its own, it's a fatal condition for many.  If SARS caused it (which is not uncommon) then what's their point?  This is an especially shitty take because they're basically saying "it's *just* depression so we don't care"  

Fucks.

@lisa_iannattone @Gab_H_R @FanCpixie So if I’m understanding this story correctly, a B.C. Govt Occupational Health contractor labeled a woman’s Long Covid symptoms as depression.  

This is one of the possible dystopian scenarios I worry about happening in the U.S. also, once more workers are disabled.
